content:
Hey all I realized we didn't say in zulip where the Raven case management reference implementation. We have a connectathon instance just for connectathon at https://apps.hdap.gatech.edu/raven-dashboard-connectathon/. You can use this tool to

  • Review test case data in a demo-style case viewer
  • Import case data from a CSV
  • Use the search workflow to retrieve data from bluejay (EDRS Reference Implementation) or GAVERS.
